utter_explain/ask_amount.text: In this specific question, we are asking you how many pizzas of the same type you would like in your order.

utter_explain/ask_size.text: We offer four sizes. Small - 10", medium - 12", large - 14", extra large - 18".

utter_explain/ask_crust.text: Our restaurant offers several types of pizza dough. You can choose from thin crust, stuffed crust, flat bread crust and cracker crust.
